messages.title: WE'RE BACKING GREG FOR BROXTOWE
messages.content: "Greg has campaigned and fought for a fairer society all his life. I can think of no-one better to defend our values of equality." - Kat, Student, Stapleford; "In a time of uncertainty I fully support Greg. He's a local, genuine man who lives in and cares about the area. He'd make an MP I could truly believe in." - Rich, Local business owner, Beeston

messages.title: THE ROAD TO REBUILDING THE ECONOMY: BROXTOWE
A BETTER BROXTOWE
messages.content: "Broxtowe is my first choice and my only choice. It would be an honour to represent you."

issues.economy: I've been calling for greater investment into areas like Environ 24.
issues.environment: To the community and around Environ 24.

community.content: It's already an absolute honour representing the place where I was born and grew up. From my work as a Labour Councillor on Broxtowe Borough Council to my work with the Environ 24 campaign, I'm dedicated to making it a great place to live.

leaflet.personalStatement: Broxtowe is my first choice and my only choice. It would be an honour to represent you.

politicalExperience.role: Labour Councillor on Broxtowe Borough Council
politicalExperience.achievements: Calling for greater investment into areas like Environ 24.

contactInformation.address: Broxtowe Labour Party, 106 Chilwell Road, Beeston, Nottingham, NG9 1ES

images.caption: Greg Marshall, Labour Candidate for Broxtowe, speaking at and participating in various community and campaign events.
